MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL34 postcode area of Penmaenmawr, affecting properties in Mountain Lane,  Conwy Old Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:45PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead line network. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:33PM on 19th February 2021.
